property.name: Rules
property.value: {BUZZRENDER}(3) (When you pay this creature's cost, you may pay any number of additional (3). When you put this creature into the battle zone, use its Buzzrender ability once and the number of additional times you paid (3).) 15px Shuffle your deck and reveal the top card. If it's a creature, you may summon it for no cost. If it's a spell, you may cast it for no cost. {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.value: Twinpact Map

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ This creature can't attack. TWINPACT ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a twinpact card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {REVOLUTION CHANGE} Water, Fire or Nature command - (When one of your Water, Fire or Nature commands attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your Commands get "speed attacker", "mach fighter" and can't be blocked. ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, untap all your other creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, this creature breaks one of your opponent's shields. TWINPACT ■ You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, draw a card. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Armored Dragon/World Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker" and "slayer". ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put this creature's "EX Life" shield into your graveyard. If you do, your opponent can't cast spells until the start of your turn.

property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand. TWINPACT ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You may choose one or more cards from a player's graveyard. That player shuffles those cards into their deck.

property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You may choose one or more cards from a player's graveyard. That player shuffles those cards into their deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less. {SUPER}When you put this creature, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win the game until the end of the turn.
